filter.ftbfiltersystem.item_tag.name: Item Tag
filter.ftbfiltersystem.item.tooltip:
Matches against a specific item.
NBT is not checked here (see NBT and Fuzzy NBT filters)
Items can be picked from Creative or Inventory item lists.
Use the textfield to filter item ID's to limit the displayed items.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.fuzzy_nbt.name: Fuzzy NBT
filter.ftbfiltersystem.max_stack_size.to:
Matches against an item's maximum stack size.
Unstackable items have a maximum stack size of 1.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.only_one.tooltip: Compound filter: this filter matches if exactly ONE of its child filters matches.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.food_value.toolti:
Matches an item based on its nutritional value (half-shanks of food restored)
Non-food items have a nutritional value of 0
filter.ftbfiltersystem.durability.name: Durability
filter.ftbfiltersystem.stack_size.name: Stack Size
filter.ftbfiltersystem.and.tooltip: Compound filter: this filter matches if ALL of its child filters match.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.food_value.name: Food Value
item.ftbfiltersystem.smart_filter.toolti: Sneak + Right-click: Test filter with item in off hand
filter.ftbfiltersystem.stack_size.toolti: Matches against an item's current stack size.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.durability.toolti:
Matches an item based on its remaining durability.
Non-damageable items are considered to have a durability of 0.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.root.name: All Of (Root)
filter.ftbfiltersystem.mod.tooltip:
Matches against the mod which adds the item.
Vanilla items are in the Minecraft 'mod'.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.not.tooltip: Compound filter: this filter matches if its child filter does NOT match. At most one child can be added.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.only_one.name: Only One Of
filter.ftbfiltersystem.item_tag.tooltip:
Matches against an item tag; items which are in the tag will be matched.
Use the textfield to filter displayed item tags.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.expression.name: Expression
filter.ftbfiltersystem.block.name: Is Block
filter.ftbfiltersystem.and.name: All Of
filter.ftbfiltersystem.nbt.tooltip:
Matches NBT on an item.
An exact match is required.
If you have admin permissions, items in your inventory which have NBT can be clicked to copy their current NBT tag into the text editor.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.or.tooltip: Compound filter: this filter matches if ANY of its child filters match.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.block.tooltip: Simple filter which matches if the item is a placeable block.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.custom.tooltip:
Advanced filter intended for modders and modpack makers.
Fires a CustomFilterEvent when a match is attempted; set the event result to indicate a successful or failed match.
Use the textfield to provide freeform text data which is passed to the event as the 'data' parameter.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.not.name: Not
filter.ftbfiltersystem.custom.name: Custom
filter.ftbfiltersystem.expression.toolti:
Allows a literal filter expression to be entered or loaded from a Filter item in your inventory.
It is optional (but recommended!) to assign a custom name, for clarity.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.item.name: Item
ftbfiltersystem.message.no_offhand_item: Hold an item to be tested in your off hand
filter.ftbfiltersystem.mod.name: Mod
ftbfiltersystem.gui.changes_made: You have made changes to this filter
filter.ftbfiltersystem.or.name: Any Of
ftbfiltersystem.message.not_a_filter: You must hold a Smart Filter in your main hand
filter.ftbfiltersystem.fuzzy_nbt.tooltip:
Matches NBT on an item, but only the NBT fields specified here will be checked. Fields in the item's NBT not specified here are ignored.
If you have admin permissions, items in your inventory which have NBT can be clicked to copy their current NBT tag into the text editor.
